Description:
Detects a PDQDeploy service installation which indicates that PDQDeploy was installed on the machines.
PDQDeploy can be abused by attackers to remotely install packages or execute commands on target machines


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New PDQDeploy Service - Server Side
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where ((provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045') and (imagepath like '%pdqdeployservice.exe%' and (servicename = 'pdqdeploy' or servicename = 'pdq deploy')))
